title: Which companies in India are working on 5G Technology roll out? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many companies in India that are engaging in 5G and creating 5G solutions to enable the 5G ecosystem across the globe. One of the biggest collaboration that happened recently in 5G space is VVDN and STL Announce Strategic Collaboration to Design, Develop and Manufacture 5G Solutions. I guess this will completely change the 5G space especially in India, VVDN is taking a lead to make India a manufacturing powerhouse.

Airtel, Jio, Vida/idea with brodcomm, cisco etc but phone companies such as Samsung, ivo or Oppo are need to co-ordinate with mobile vendors. Phone technology itself is different, not even 50% existing smartphones support 5G now
